'''Huaqing''' {{Lang|zh=华清|zh_rm=Huáqīng}} is a member of the [[Millelith]]. He makes an appearance in Act III of [[Chapter I]] where he is on guard duty at the [[Guizhong Ballista]]. During the event [[Unreconciled Stars]], he can be found at [[Qingce Village]].
